Package icyllis.arc3d.compiler.tree

Class Swizzle

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.compiler.tree.Node
icyllis.arc3d.compiler.tree.Expression
icyllis.arc3d.compiler.tree.Swizzle
public final class Swizzle extends Expression
Represents a vector component selection such as 'float3(1, 2, 3).zyx'.

      public static final byte X
      SwizzleComponents.

      Pack format: 0xAABBGGRR; terminated with 0xFF if less than 4 (e.g. 0xFFFF0102 means myVector.zy; 0x01010301 means myVector.ywyy).

  • Method Details

    • convert

      @Nullable public static Expression convert(int position, int maskPosition, Expression base, String maskString)

    • convert

      @Nullable public static Expression convert(int position, int maskPosition, Expression base, byte[] components)
      Create swizzle expressions. This method permits components containing ZERO or ONE, does typechecking, reports errors via ErrorHandler, and returns an expression that combines constructors and native swizzles (comprised solely of X/Y/W/Z).

    • make

      @Nonnull public static Expression make(int position, Expression base, byte[] components)
